casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terry Jerome WILSON 295PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 2, 2018 Sterling Rozear, Attorney at Law, for Wilson, Terry Jerome. *131T. Hill Davis, III, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney Generals, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of February 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of February 2018."
